com.ca.svcode.sdk.function

Interface Composition.FunctionComposition<T,R>

  • Enclosing class:
    Composition

    public static interface Composition.FunctionComposition<T,R>
    Provides functional composition.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <S> Function<S,R> after(Function<S,T> before)
      Function composition by recursion.
      <S> Function<T,S> andThen(Function<R,S> then)
      Functional composition by recursion.

    • Method Detail

      • andThen

        <S> Function<T,S> andThen(Function<R,S> then)
        Functional composition by recursion. Supplied function is called then the referenced function call is finished.

      • after

        <S> Function<S,R> after(Function<S,T> before)
        Function composition by recursion. Supplied function is called immediately and passed to the referenced function.
